New Records: Mohammad Rizwan scored 68 runs off 46 balls, potentially a new record for him in T20I matches
Key Match Events: England won the toss and fielded first
Pakistan players wore special jerseys to show solidarity with flood victims
England players wore black armbands as a tribute to Queen Elizabeth II
Luke Wood made his T20I debut for England
Pre-Game Insights: England captain Moeen Ali won the toss and opted to bowl
Luke Wood made his T20I debut for England while Shan Masood played his first T20I for Pakistan
The match was the first of a seven-match series in Karachi
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's special jersey design to highlight flood victims
England's tribute to Queen Elizabeth II
Others: Teams: Pakistan and England lineups were listed
